title: The Hunt
synopsis: A 2014 Oscar nominee for Best Foreign Language Film, this story centers on a teacher who faces unfounded pedophilia accusations from a student.

title: A Royal Affair
synopsis: In 18th-century Denmark, the unstable King Christian VII neglects his young queen, Mathilde, who falls in love with his German physician.

title: In a Better World
synopsis: This acclaimed drama delves into the perceived burden of male responsibility, focusing on the interplay between two dysfunctional families.

title: Pusher
synopsis: A small-scale pusher blows a big-time heroin deal and wades into dangerous territory when he has to scramble to pay back a powerful drug lord.

title: After the Wedding
synopsis: To save the failing orphanage he runs, Jacob meets with a businessman whos offered him a generous donation -- but there are strings attached.

title: In China They Eat Dogs
synopsis: A few hours after bank clerk Arvid knocks out a robber with his squash racket, the robbers wife appeals to Arvid with a sad tale of woe.

title: Pusher 2: With Blood on My Hands
synopsis: After doing time in prison for his involvement with the underworld, habitual screwup Tonny tries to win the approval of his gangster father.

title: The Rain
synopsis: Six years after a brutal virus wipes out most of Scandinavias population, two siblings join a band of young survivors seeking safety -- and answers.

title: Love Is All You Need
synopsis: A group of people in Italy search for love, and deal with jealousy, passion and loneliness as they struggle to change their lives for the better.

title: Pusher 3: Im the Angel of Death
synopsis: A middle-aged drug lord tries to balance the planning of his daughters 25th birthday bash with the delivery of a major heroin shipment.

title: Ronal Barbaren
synopsis: When their entire barbarian tribe is kidnapped, a ragtag group of inexperienced barbarians must defy all odds on a quest to save their world.

title: Armadillo
synopsis: A documentary about Danish soldiers on a six-month Afghan tour of duty, and the boredom, adrenaline and confusion that comprise their daily routine.

title: Rita
synopsis: Independent, outspoken and adored by her students, private school teacher Rita fares less well with adults in this comedy-drama from Denmark.

title: En chance til
synopsis: After his infant son suddenly dies, a police detective steals a drug-addicted couples neglected baby, leaving his sons body in place of their child.

title: R
synopsis: After committing a vicious crime, a young career criminal is sentenced to serve in a harsh Danish prison, where gangs make his life a living hell.

title: Northwest
synopsis: An ambitious teen working for a local crime boss finds himself swimming in dangerous waters when he accepts an offer from a rival crime lord.

title: April 9th
synopsis: On a fateful day after the dawn of World War II, the courageous Danish bicycle infantry staves off invading German forces as it awaits reinforcements.

title: The Shamers Daughter
synopsis: A reviled widow and her daughter, who have the ability to peer into peoples souls, are called upon to investigate the murder of the royal family.

title: Klassefesten
synopsis: Three middle-aged men who get together for their 25-year class reunion discover that partying and acting like boys isnt as easy as it used to be.

title: A Funny Man
synopsis: Over three decades, beloved comedian Dirch Passer struggles to maintain a balance between his public persona and his private demons and ambitions.

title: Kandidaten
synopsis: Framed and blackmailed for a brutal murder, defense attorney Jonas Bechmann frantically searches for the people whove set him up.

title: Those Who Kill
synopsis: A Copenhagen cop and a psychiatrist track down serial killers, including one who attacks entire households, another whos already in prison and more.

title: Dicte
synopsis: A crime reporter starts a new life by returning to her hometown, where she finds herself at odds with the police when she tries to solve their cases.

title: Alle for en
synopsis: Four life-long best friends run afoul of each other when one become a policeman and the others find their moral ground a little less stable.

title: Anklaget
synopsis: Teenage Stine accuses her father of sexually abusing her. But Stine has a history of lying, and her mother questions the accusation.

title: Headhunter
synopsis: After being secretly hired to locate an executive to take over an influential firm, a recruiter learns he has become a pawn in a corporate scheme.

title: Sex, Drugs and Taxation
synopsis: This buddy biopic charts the friendship and business dealings of a hard-partying playboy and a timid lawyer who transformed Denmarks travel industry.

title: All for Two
synopsis: After going their separate ways, once-chummy criminals Nikolai, Ralf and Timo reunite for one last score: to get back whats rightfully theirs.

title: At Worlds End
synopsis: Hilarity and action combine in this unique thriller about psychiatrist Adrian, who is sent to Sumatra to judge the sanity of a fellow Dane, Severin, whose excuse for committing murder is that he was guarding a rare plant that can bestow immortality.

title: Room 205
synopsis: After moving into a new dorm, a coed begins to suspect that the ghost of a prior resident -- a student who was murdered -- is looking for vengeance.

title: Undercover
synopsis: With Christmas just around the corner, a spunky police officer is ordered to keep an eye on a dodgy witness, who has angry enemies to spare.

title: Klassefesten 2: Begravelsen
synopsis: After another friend dies during a wild bachelor party, a groom-to-be and his two pals set out for the funeral while debating their own murky futures.

title: The Shooter
synopsis: A dogged journalist writes about government oil drilling in the Arctic, prompting an enraged geophysicist to terrorize Copenhagen with a sniper rifle.

title: Kapgang
synopsis: A 14-year-old boy tries to cope with the death of his mother, as well as the emergence of romantic feelings for members of the opposite and same sex.

title: Sorrow and Joy
synopsis: After a woman kills her infant daughter during a tragic breakdown, her husband pleads for compassion and faces his own guilt for her fragile state.

title: Player
synopsis: A lawyers humdrum life is jolted after hes hustled out of millions. Fortunately, he soon meets his knight in shining armor: an old pal who gambles.

title: Someone You Love
synopsis: While on a visit home to Denmark, a self-absorbed musician reconnects with his grown-up daughter and is introduced to the grandson he has never met.

title: Den sorte Madonna
synopsis: When Marias father sends her a priceless icon hes stolen, she must decide whether to collect the reward or protect the dad who walked out on her.

title: Over the Edge
synopsis: Soon after moving into their dream country home, mercurial lovers David and Freja become entangled in the dark aftereffects of a suspicious suicide.

title: The Cartel
synopsis: Lars Halbo does things his way after taking over the family business -- until his success pits him against some very dangerous cartels.

title: Lykkevej
synopsis: When she discovers that her husband is having an affair, an upper-class wife starts life anew in an eccentric middle-class neighborhood.

title: Til doden os skiller
synopsis: His life in shambles, Jan enters group therapy where he befriends two other men. When he invites them home, his life takes a turn for the worse.

title: Vicevaerten
synopsis: Per is a joyless, angry caretaker. But one day he finds a naked girl in an empty apartment who seems to have healing powers.

title: Olsen-banden pa de bonede gulve
synopsis: The gang is given a job for the Prime Ministers Office: Steal H. C. Andersens quill pen. But what about Hallandsen, their enemy? Egon has a plan.

title: On the Edge
synopsis: Two friends who love fast cars are devastated after one kills a woman during a street race and the other flees the scene but is haunted by guilt.

title: Hjordis
synopsis: This miniseries spinoff of Rita follows teacher Hjørdis as she plans a school play on bullying featuring a cast of socially awkward students.

title: Jensen and Jensen
synopsis: Two amateur bounty hunters are up against sadistic cops, armed Vatican cardinals and a horny goat as they track down Europes most dangerous criminal.

title: People Get Eaten
synopsis: As her daughters wedding approaches, a married but restless woman sees her predictable life shaken when her husband vanishes.

title: Rosita
synopsis: In a remote Danish fishing village, a middle-aged widowers son is attracted to the young Filipino woman whom his father is considering marrying.

title: The Erotic Man
synopsis: Influential Danish filmmaker Jorgen Leth delivers a visually arresting meditation on aging, sex and lost romance in this semi-autobiographical documentary filmed on location in Argentina, Brazil, Haiti, Panama, the Philippines and Senegal.

title: Dannys Doomsday
synopsis: Two teenage brothers must set aside their bitter feud when climate changes give birth to terrifying creatures dead set on eating everything in sight.

title: Rosa Morena
synopsis: Prevented from adopting a child in his native Denmark, Thomas travels to Brazil where he meets a woman willing to give him the baby she is carrying.

title: Olsen Banden på dybt vand
synopsis: Felonious Egon Olsen and his cronies scheme to rip off an oil company, but crocodiles, a ramshackle submarine and other troubles hinder their plans.

title: Karlas Kabale
synopsis: Karlas wishes to celebrate Christmas with her entire family. However, it is not easy to do as her parents cant stand each other after the divorce.

title: Karla and Jonas
synopsis: Smitten with a boy who lives in a childrens home, Karla tries to get closer to her crush by setting out for the big city with him to find his mom.

title: Karla og Katrine
synopsis: Karla and Katrines new friend, who is a foster child, is suspected of being a thief. Now the two girls must help him like he helped them.

title: Fairytaler
synopsis: This animated series presents the timeless fairy tales of Hans Christian Andersen, whose classic stories inspire children and adults alike.

title: Out of Bounds
synopsis: When a pregnant Stella totes her fiancé, Oskar, to a lonely island to visit her reclusive father, mounting friction between the two men reveals a series of imperceptible cracks in the couples relationship.

title: Rasmus Klump
synopsis: This animated childrens series follows happy little bear Rasmus Klump, who travels around the world on a ship with his animal friends.

title: To verdener
synopsis: Sara and her family have always lived by Jehovahs commandments. But when she falls in love with Teis, she is faced with a very difficult decision.

title: Father of Four: The return of uncle Sofus
synopsis: When his uncles cranky twin Sofus enters his Australian cow in a milking contest, Far and his kids must work hard to win the prize and Sofuss heart.

title: Lærkevej: The Movie
synopsis: When boozy Elisabeth suddenly falls deathly ill, her neighbors realize life is short, so they indulge in swinging sex and spill their darkest secrets.

title: Emma and Julemanden
synopsis: Feeling overlooked by her own family, an imaginative young girl embarks upon an otherworldly adventure to rescue Santas newborn daughter.
